Title: Best useless app
Review: This app doesn't show any transactions made on card. Customer care guys asks us to install it which doesn't work. When I ask them why it's not showing up they asked me to check on online. Nothing I can do with app except to know how much I owe

Title: Outdated method of updates
Review:
The app is ok but the app update process is a total let down and dissappointnent. 

A SCB person calls you every month and says "We have an update sir! Please log in and out to recieve the updates"

I mean seriously?? In this day and age this is how you do app updates?

Title: Thanks for the update
Review: Im glad you have finally did the update, thanks good job!

Title: Excellent Banking Application
Review: Excellent Mobile Banking Application. Just download and have a look all your banking transaction history and transfer money anywhere, even back home, pay utility bills, pay other bank's loan or credit card just sitting in the office or from outside the country....

Title: Truly wonderful banking experience
Review:
It's the best source to look at and manage my financials. Seeing all my transactions across various accounts and products on a timeline was an amazing experience.

Also just paid my Salik bill through it. Don't think I'll be using any other service now...
